summary: As Eve begins writing songs as a way to sort through some emotional problems, she meets James and Cassie, two musicians each at crossroads of their own.
cast: Emily Browning|Olly Alexander|Hannah Murray|Pierre Boulanger|Cora Bisset|Sarah Swire|Mark Radcliffe|Stuart Maconie|Ann Scott-Jones|Josie Long|Pauline King|Kath Howden|Alex Klobouk|Paul Flanagan|Michael Drum|Michael M.|Lee Thomson|Donnie McInnes|Kieran Murdoch|Eve Boermans|Miles Berman|John Henderson|Gerry McLean|Sarah Martin|Christopher Geddes|Mick Cooke|Gary Grochla|Kate Alcock|Dackson 5|Christopher McCann|Anne McEwan|Lee Johnstone|Ross Laird|Declan O'Keefe|Ben Maclaine|Cassie Oji|Jean Paul Parsons|Robbie Reid|Bjorn Sandberg|Erik Sandberg|Jamie Wright|Natalie Dawson|Marisa Privitera|Chuck Jackson|Celia Garcia|Thomas Baylis|Coral Bevan|Bay Bryan|Ryan Ferris|Will Goswold|Sheila Grant|Zoe Halliday|Sarah Kennedy|Lawrence Libor|Kirsty McLaren|Jordan MacDonald|Robert Sharpe|Lauren Steele|The Fairfield Tea Dabcers|Valliard Aixinjerro|Jonathan Hansmann|Lewis Rowney|Darren Wright|Irina Preda
title: God Help the Girl
